Text: This is a great sequel, but do watch the first Phantom first: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6908673/The.Phantom.Of.The.Opera.At.The.Royal.Albert.Hall.2011.PROPER.720p.BluRay.x264-HD4U

Thanks a bunch for this upload.  I live in the U.S. and it looks like LND will probably never play here now, after it was postponed once and then a second time indefinitely.  This is probably the only way we'd get a chance to see it here, and we'd have to wait 2 more months for it to be released.
